metadata.name: ActivityPub::ProcessStatusUpdateService #call when originally with a poll records media change in edit

sql_query.sql: SELECT "status_edits"."id", "status_edits"."status_id", "status_edits"."account_id", "status_edits"."text", "status_edits"."spoiler_text", "status_edits"."created_at", "status_edits"."updated_at", "status_edits"."ordered_media_attachment_ids", "status_edits"."media_descriptions", "status_edits"."poll_options", "status_edits"."sensitive" FROM "status_edits" WHERE "status_edits"."status_id" = $1 ORDER BY "status_edits"."id" ASC
